sentences.en: He it dive by inventing the scuba diving machine.
sentences.cn: .他发明了水下呼吸器使潜水成为可能.

sentences.en: I first got hooked on scuba diving when I was twelve.
sentences.cn: 12岁时我开始迷上了带水肺潜水.

sentences.en: I was thinking about a romantic cruise or scuba diving lessons.
sentences.cn: 我在想我们可以来趟浪漫的渡轮行,或是去上潜水课.

sentences.en: Lovers of surfing, sailing and scuba diving flock to the ocean.
sentences.cn: 冲浪 、 驾帆船和潜水的爱好者群集于海中.

sentences.en: My hobbies were skiing and scuba diving.
Once applied, lipstickwill never rub off - even while scuba diving.
sentences.cn: 一旦涂上唇膏,它就永远不会掉色 —— 即使是在潜水的时候.

sentences.en: Rahman Marine Park Dive Trip, Scuba Diving , Kota Kinabalu, Sabah, Borneo, Malaysia.
sentences.cn: 潜水行程, 套装组合, 亚庇市, 沙巴, 婆罗洲, 马来西亚.

sentences.en: Ron Artest doesn't use scuba diving equipment. He just holds his breath.
sentences.cn: 阿泰潜水不用水中呼吸器, 他自己能控制呼吸.

sentences.en: Scuba diving! SCUBA stands for self - contained underwater breathing apparatus. Do you catch my drift?
sentences.cn: 戴水肺潜水! SCUBA是独立的水下氧气呼吸器. 你喜欢漂流 吗 ?

sentences.en: The cast not only perfected the waltz, they also mastered scuba diving.
sentences.cn: 演员们不仅华尔兹跳地完美无瑕, 他们也熟谙深水潜水.

sentences.en: The diving school has acquired a franchise for scuba equipment.
sentences.cn: 潜水学校获得潜水用水肺的特许经营权.

sentences.en: The scuba diver submerged and swarm toward a coral reef.
sentences.cn: 戴着呼吸器的潜水员潜入水底,朝珊瑚礁游了过去.

sentences.en: This may have been a draw for the royal couple, since Prince William apparently enjoys his scuba, according to ABC News.
sentences.cn: 这可能是吸引到这对皇家夫妇的地方，因为威廉王子，据ABC广播公司新闻网说，是很喜欢水肺潜水的。

sentences.en: Visitors can also try their hand at deep - sea fishing, scuba Sea - Doo rentals.
sentences.cn: 参观者还可以租借水肺尝试到深海捕鱼.

sentences.en: While on honeymoon in Bali, she learned to scuba dive.
sentences.cn: 她在巴厘岛度蜜月时学会了带水肺潜水.

sentences.en: You can enjoy scuba diving, fishing, and mountaineering in Dalian.
sentences.cn: 你可以在大连享受潜水 、 垂钓 、 登山之乐.

trans.tran_cn: 水肺，便携式水下呼吸器
